scenario_text.value:
Careful, now. I can’t back you up right now
if something goes down.

Tough luck if any of you get hurt. Miu comes
first, and that’s a fact.

Them’s the breaks, Takuma. Kaito’s on edge
worrying over Miu.

’Course I’m on edge! There ain’t nothing
about this situation that’s safe!
Ah, calm down, calm down!

(Man, this’ll turn into a fight at this
rate.)

(Still, I’m not surprised to see Kaito tense
in a situation like this.)

(I wonder how I can cool the temperature
here...)
(How do I calm things down?)
Pacify Kaito.
Cover for Dracmon.
Be appreciative.
Pacify Kaito.

Squabbling is the last thing we have time for
here. Chill out, man.
...Damn, you ain’t wrong.
Cover for Dracmon.

Dracmon’s done nothing wrong. He’s just
following your lead, you know.
Say what?

And besides, we didn’t come here to give each
other ’tude, now did we?
Hmph...
Appreciate him.

I appreciate the concern, Kaito. Don’t worry,
I can take care of myself.

Who said I’m concerned? I’m just telling you
not to slow us down.

What’s that, now? C’mon, Kaito, no need to be
shy...

Dracmon! Don’t poke the bear, you’ll just
make things worse.
Hmph.

Well, anything could happen here, that’s for
sure.

Gotta go all out for Miu here. Better get
your ass in gear if you wanna survive.
Yeah.

We’re surrounded by enemies and fog. Psyche
yourself up if you ain’t got a death wish.
